flawed_nl_solution:
Rock and Roll CDs will be 5*4 = <<5*4=20>>20 dollars.
Pop CDs will be 10*4 = <<10*4=40>>40 dollars.
Dance CDs will be 3*4 = <<3*4=21>>21 dollars.
Country CDs will be 7*4 = <<7*4=28>>28 dollars.
In total Julia would need 20+40+21+28 = <<20+40+21+28=109>>109 dollars.
Julia is short 109-75 = <<109-75=34>>34 dollars.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 21. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
